author: Gregg Wallace
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/160C Fan/Gas 4.  Spray 6 ramekins with non-stick spray.  Divide the stuffing equally between the ramekins. Then crack an egg on top of the stuffing. Add 1 tablespoonful of milk or cream to each ramekin and season with salt and pepper.  Place the ramekins in a deep baking tray and fill it partially with boiling water.  Bake for 10-15 minutes until the eggs are set. Serve with leftover ham for brilliant Boxing Day breakfast.
ingredients: leftover stuffing,  6 free-range eggs,  non-stick spray,  1 tbsp milk or cream ,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  leftover ham
